title: Looking to try out for a team
body: I'm trying to get to gold and maybe more but i have been to silver but I can't seem to escape bronze at the moment. I'm willing to tryout to be on your team. Thank you very much.

replies.body: Hi, it might be more useful for you if you post on the [NA boards ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) :)
Maybe this lv of awardness is what keeping him from achieving his goal :D
